Yafei Ou
Yafei Ou

Bio

I am now a Postdoctoral Researcher at Biomedical Artificial Intelligence Research Unit, Institute of Innovative Research, Tokyo Institute of Technology, hosted by Prof. Kenji Suzuki. I got my Ph.D. degree from Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, Hokkaido University in March 2023, supervised by Prof. Masayuki Ikebe.

My main interests are in Medical Image Analysis, Multi-modal, Explainable AI, and Computer Vision.


Selected Publications

( * Equal Contribution and # Corresponding Author)

BLS-GAN: A Deep Layer Separation Framework for Eliminating Bone Overlap in Conventional Radiographs

Haolin Wang, Yafei Ou#, Prasoon Ambalathankandy, Gen Ota, Pengyu Dai, Masayuki Ikebe, Kenji Suzuki, Tamotsu Kamishima.

Tri-VQA: Triangular Reasoning Medical Visual Question Answering for Multi-Attribute Analysis

Lin Fan, Xun Gong, Cenyang Zheng, Yafei Ou#.
In 2024 IEEE International Conference on Bioinformatics and Biomedicine (IEEE BIBM 2024) (acceptance rate: 22%), December 03, 2024.

SaSaMIM: Synthetic Anatomical Semantics-Aware Masked Image Modeling for Colon Tumor Segmentation in Non-contrast Abdominal Computed Tomography

Pengyu Dai, Yafei Ou#, Yuqiao Yang, Dichao Liu, Masahiro Hashimoto, Masahiro Jinzaki, Mototaka Miyake, Kenji Suzuki.
In the 27th International Conference on Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention (MICCAI 2024) (acceptance rate: 30%), October 06, 2024.

A Deep Registration Method for Accurate Quantification of Joint Space Narrowing Progression in Rheumatoid Arthritis

In Computerized Medical Imaging and Graphics (IF: 5.4), July 15, 2023.

A Sub-pixel Accurate Quantification of Joint Space Narrowing Progression in Rheumatoid Arthritis (Featured Article, Top 7% & Cover Article of Special Issue, 1/12) (2023 IEEE Sapporo Young Professionals Best Paper Award)

Yafei Ou, Prasoon Ambalathankandy, Ryunosuke Furuya, Seiya Kawada, Tianyu Zeng, Yujie An, Tamotsu Kamishima, Kenichi Tamura, Masayuki Ikebe#.
